data.title: One Network Device, One Host Device at a Time = Defeats the Purpose
data.body:
As a mobile DJ hoping to streamline my setup, I had high expectations for the Suckoo Ethernet Cable 1 in 2 Out. Unfortunately, this product fell short of its promise and proved to be far from a game-changer.

The primary issue lies in its limitation to use only one host at a time with one network device, rendering it no more effective than a one-to-one connection. This severe limitation significantly impacts the product's utility, especially for those seeking a solution to connect two media players to a mixer over Ethernet.

Given these constraints, I must express my disappointment with the product's performance. The promise of flexibility and efficiency is not met, and it fails to serve the intended purpose. Instead, I strongly recommend opting for a 5-port network switch, which provides a more effective and versatile solution for connecting multiple devices.
